item.title: 瓦卡穆埃尔塔：米莱伊希望将阿根廷页岩转化为其连任的动力。
item.description:
阿根廷巴塔哥尼亚的瓦卡穆埃尔塔油田在经历了多年的失败之后，正在增加原油出口。对于这位自由主义总统的计划来说，这是一次至关重要的繁荣。【原文：

El yacimiento de Vaca Muerta, en la Patagonia argentina, está aumentando sus exportaciones de petróleo crudo tras años de partidas en falso. Es un auge vital para los planes del presidente libertario.

】

item.title: 米莱伊正在开发阿根廷的二叠纪，以巩固其改革成果
item.description:
巴塔哥尼亚的瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩矿床在经历了多年的失败之后，石油出口正在加速。自由主义总统寄希望于这种繁荣。【原文：

Oil exports are ramping up from the Vaca Muerta shale deposit in Patagonia after years of false starts. It’s a boom the libertarian president is counting on.

】

item.title: 泽西海岸学校因财产税纠纷威胁破产
item.description: 新泽西州的一个学区在多年的州政府资金削减后威胁要申请破产，与州长菲尔-墨菲（Phil Murphy）政府的摊牌升级。【原文：A New Jersey school district is threatening to file bankruptcy after years of state funding cuts, escalating a showdown with Governor Phil Murphy’s administration.】

item.title: 力拓支持的铝业公司将向加拿大项目投资 11 亿美元
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，力拓集团（Rio Tinto Plc）部分持股的铝制造商 Aluminerie Alouette 正计划投入多达 15 亿加元（11 亿美元）对其位于魁北克北部的设施进行现代化改造。【原文：Aluminerie Alouette, an aluminum maker that’s partially owned by Rio Tinto Plc, is planning to commit as much as C$1.5 billion ($1.1 billion) to modernizing its facilities in northern Quebec, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 作为中型企业的 IPO 替代方案，SPAC 重新受到青睐
item.description: 在被冷落数年之后，特殊目的收购公司再次将自己定位为传统首次公开募股的替代品，为那些在首次股票销售复苏初期被冷落的企业提供机会。【原文：After years out in the cold, special purpose acquisition companies are again positioning themselves as an alternative to traditional initial public offerings for businesses that have been left out of the nascent recovery in first-time stock sales.】

item.title: 富国银行在三年回调后将加大购买 CLO 的力度
item.description: 据知情人士透露，富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. is ramping up buying top-rated collateralized loan obligations, after largely staying away from the $1.3 trillion market following interest rate hikes in 2022, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特立尼达旨在通过英国石油公司和伍德赛德公司的项目提高天然气产量
item.description: 特立尼达和多巴哥正在努力扭转天然气生产严重下滑的局面，重振这个加勒比国家的重要出口产业，以促进其经济增长。【原文：Trinidad and Tobago is working to reverse a major slump in gas production and revive a key export industry in the Caribbean nation to boost its economic growth.】

item.title: 澳大利亚考虑在波动中降低超长期债券销售额
item.description: 澳大利亚债务管理机构正在考虑缩减超长期债券的发行量，因为收益率的上升使得融资成本更加昂贵。【原文：Australia’s debt manager is considering scaling back its issuance of ultra-long bonds as rising yields make funding more expensive.】

item.title: 斯塔默危机表明英国仍受债券市场摆布
item.description: 全球债券投资者提醒英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）英国政治的一个残酷事实：市场的判决可能是迅速而严厉的。【原文：Global bond investors reminded Prime Minister Keir Starmer of a harsh truth of British politics: The market’s verdict can be swift and punishing.】

item.title: 在 "风险至上 "的市场中，贝莱德看好美股而非欧洲股市
item.description: 贝莱德投资研究所（BlackRock Investment Institute）的数据显示，随着股市飙升，美国股市是最佳的投资场所，因此先不要放弃 "美国例外论 "的概念。【原文：Don’t write off the notion of “America Exceptionalism” just yet, as the US stock market is the best place to be with equities roaring higher, according to the BlackRock Investment Institute.】

item.title: 美联储重要监管官员自愿辞职
item.description: 据彭博社查阅的一封内部电子邮件显示，美联储监管与法规部主任迈克尔-吉布森（Michael Gibson）已接受该机构的自愿辞职提议，并计划在央行任职三十多年后于本月离职。【原文：Michael Gibson, director of the Federal Reserve’s supervision and regulation division, has accepted the agency’s voluntary resignation offer and plans to leave this month after more than three decades at the central bank, according to an internal email viewed by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 邦吉完成拖延已久的 Viterra 交易，组建作物行业巨头
item.description: 邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global SA）完成了对嘉能可（Glencore Plc）支持的维特拉公司（Viterra）的收购，此举将有助于合并后的企业更好地与嘉吉公司（Cargill Inc）和阿彻-丹尼尔斯-米德兰公司（Archer-Daniels-Midland Co.【原文：Bunge Global SA completed its takeover of Glencore Plc-backed Viterra, a move that will help the combined businesses better compete with larger rivals like Cargill Inc. and Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. as the crop-trading sector faces a downturn in profits.】

item.title: 贝森特发表讲话后，华尔街交易商对国债拍卖规模的预测大打折扣
item.description: 在财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）本周发表评论之后，华尔街的交易商们又回到了原点。【原文：Wall Street dealers — until recently expecting US government debt auction sizes to resume growing next year — are going back to the drawing board after comments by Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent this week.】

item.title: 临时资金使纽约市破产公寓免于维修困境
item.description: 本周早些时候，纽约市一些公寓的房东乔尔-维纳（Joel Wiener）因资金短缺，管理人员无法进行标准的维护工作；租户们不得不在周末假期忍受电梯故障。现在，在联邦法官批准临时拨款维修这些大楼后，这些维修工作可以进行了。【原文：Earlier this week, some New York City apartments landlord Joel Wiener owns were so low on cash that managers couldn’t do standard upkeep; tenants would have to endure broken elevators over the holiday weekend. Now those fixes can happen after a federal judge authorized temporary funding to maintain the buildings.】

item.title: ING 认为关税刺激通胀后美元将得到缓解
item.description: 荷兰国际集团银行（ING Bank NV）策略师克里斯-特纳（Chris Turner）认为，在关税提高通胀率并迫使美联储推迟降息之后，美元将迎来几个月的上涨。【原文：The dollar is headed for a few months of gains after tariffs raise inflation and force the Federal Reserve to delay interest rate cuts, according to ING Bank NV strategist Chris Turner.】

item.title: 甲骨文与 OpenAI 将星际之门交易扩展至更多美国数据中心
item.description: OpenAI 同意从甲骨文公司的数据中心租用大量计算能力，作为其星际之门计划的一部分，这凸显了对尖端人工智能产品的强烈需求。【原文：OpenAI has agreed to rent a massive amount of computing power from Oracle Corp. data centers as part of its Stargate initiative, underscoring the intense requirements for cutting-edge artificial intelligence products.】

item.title: 被评为 "垃圾级 "的学院 5400 万美元债券交易推迟定价
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印第安纳州一所私立大学瓦尔帕莱索大学的债券销售已被推迟，因为其利基结构面临的买家数量较少。【原文：A bond sale by Valparaiso University, a private college in Indiana, has been delayed, according to people familiar with the matter, as its niche structure faces a smaller pool of buyers.】

item.title: 比特币的原始吸引力随着波动率降至两年低点而消退
item.description: 随着比特币在今年大部分时间里陷入窄幅交易区间，这种自诞生以来最大的数字货币的主要吸引力之一正在减弱。【原文：With Bitcoin stuck in a narrow trading range for much of the year, one of key attractions of the largest digital currency since its earliest days is waning.】

item.description: 支付和稳定币公司瑞波实验室（Ripple Labs Inc.【原文：The payments and stablecoin firm Ripple Labs Inc. applied to become a national bank as a bevy of firms in the financial-technology and cryptocurrency space seek such approval under President Donald Trump’s looser regulatory regime.】

item.title: 季节性红利刺激美元需求，阿根廷比索走软
item.description: 阿根廷比索连续第三个交易日下跌，原因是南美冬季假期前对美元的季节性需求增加，而市场预计未来几个月硬通货供应将减少。【原文：Argentina’s peso extended its slide for a third session as seasonal demand for dollars picks up ahead of the South American winter holidays, while markets anticipate a dwindling supply of hard currency in the coming months.】

item.title: 德国立场坚定，联合信贷银行重申德国商业银行合并计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，联合信贷银行首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 与德国财政部长 Lars Klingbeil 就德国商业银行的未来交换了信件。【原文：UniCredit CEO Andrea Orcel and German Finance Minister Lars Klingbeil exchanged letters over the future of Commerzbank AG, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Blackstone 在 13 亿美元交易中从 Vista 收购 Cvent 其余股份
item.description: 收购公司 Vista Equity Partners 已达成协议，将其持有的 Cvent Holding Corp. 少数股权出售给 Blackstone Inc.【原文：Buyout firm Vista Equity Partners has struck a deal to sell its minority stake in Cvent Holding Corp. to Blackstone Inc., marking a full exit for Vista from the events software company.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚与官方债权人达成债务重组协议
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚与官方债权人达成了一项重组贷款的谅解备忘录，正式确定了一项债务处理计划，为超过 35 亿美元的债务提供减免。【原文：Ethiopia agreed a memorandum of understanding to restructure its loans with official creditors, formalizing a debt treatment plan offering relief for more than $3.5 billion.】

item.title: TikTok 裁减美国电子商务部门更多员工
item.description: TikTok 正在裁减其美国电子商务部门 TikTok Shop 的更多员工，这是该团队自 4 月份以来的第三轮裁员。【原文：TikTok is cutting more workers from its US e-commerce division, TikTok Shop, the third round of layoffs for that team since April.】

item.title: 特朗普打击移民会带来哪些经济后果？

item.title: 注重成本的游客今夏启航，邮轮获利颇丰
item.description: 美国独立日假期即将来临，但许多美国游客并没有像往常一样在海滩上烧烤和放烟花，而是启程前往某个异国港口。【原文：America’s Independence Day holiday is fast approaching, but instead of the usual beach barbecues and fireworks displays, many US travelers are setting sail for some exotic port.】

item.title: 美国页岩钻探放缓，特朗普关税引发高管震荡
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行的一项调查显示，由于油价下跌和唐纳德-特朗普总统关税的不确定性损害了利润，美国页岩油公司高管预计今年的钻井数量将大大少于2025年初的计划。【原文：US shale executives expect to drill significantly fewer wells this year than planned at the start of 2025, as lower oil prices and uncertainty around President Donald Trump’s tariffs hurt profits, according to a Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas survey.】

item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，非洲打车初创公司Moove即将在一轮债务融资中筹集12亿美元，这将帮助该公司与Alphabet公司旗下的Waymo合作，为自动驾驶车队的推广提供资金，并在美国市场扩张。【原文：African ride-hailing startup Moove is close to raising $1.2 billion in a debt round that will help it finance a rollout of an autonomous-driving fleet with Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo and expand in the US, people familiar with the matter said.】
